蠲.definition: to deduct; to show; bright and clean; glow-worm; galleyworm; millipede

蠲免.definition: to let sb off (punishment, taxation etc); to reprieve sb

蠲減.definition: to remove or lighten (a tax etc)

蠲潔.definition: to cleanse; to clean; to purify

蠲苛.definition: to remove an oppressive law, tax etc

蠲除.definition: to reprieve; to avoid; to redeem
